About us

We invite
you to visit our cafe

In 2010, Déjà Brew opened its first location in downtown Boston. Focused entirely on serving the perfect food, the cozy cafe located in the city's busy Financial District created a sensation in the area winning praise from food critics and numerous people's choice awards.

 
Why us

Why do people choose us?

Déjà Brew has received numerous awards including: Best
brunch from the readers of Boston Globe.

Best beans

We use only the best beans
in the market. We always care
about our clients.

Fresh bakery

Always fresh and tasty bakery
products waiting for you in our
coffee house.

Quality milk

We care about your health and
use milk only from the best
manufacturers.

 
Team

We are ready to serve you

We have a combined 12+ years in the culinary industry,
we love food and we love what we do.

menu

our menu

Choose from our wide range of delicious and freshly prepared
beverages and pastries.

 

  • P'Spice Latte

    Espresso and milk with the flavor of
    pumpkin and nutmeg.

    $9.99

  • Caffè Mocha

    Espresso combined with mocha sauce
    and steamed milk.

    $9.99

  • Caramel Macchiato

    Steamed milk with vanilla espresso
    and caramel drizzle.

    $9.99

  • Hazelnut Latte

    House-made hazelnut-praline-infused
    milk with espresso.

    $9.99

  • Piccollo Latte

    Cold Brew, demerara sugar, chicory
    root roasted.

    $9.99

  • Flat White

    A coffee drink with a double espresso
    & lightly frosted milk.

    $9.99

  • Coffee Frappuccino

    Coffee meets milk and ice in a blender
    to create our Frappuccino.

    $9.99

  • Hot Cappuccino

    Dark, rich espresso lies in wait under a
    layer of thick milk foam.

    $9.99

Recipes

Cooking Tips & Recipes

Learn cooking tips, tricks and recipes from our pastry chef.

Enhance your latte flavours

Wanna enhance the flavours for your next meal? Learn the tips our pastry chef use to make our food taste world class and give it that extra zest.

David Lewis

12/11/22

Hazelnut Coconut Bread

Featured in Edible Boston Magazine, our pastry chef created this recipe over 10+ years ago. Learn how he did it and how you can add your own spin on it.

David Lewis

02/16/23

Becoming a better Chef

Becoming a pastry chef is not easy, but if you follow a few guidelines from our own expert, maybe we can help make your journey just a little bit easier.
